    • Method Detail

      • createPhase

        public  createPhase(Phase phase)
                  throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /phases : Create a new phase.
        Parameters:
        phase - the phase to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new phase, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the phase has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updatePhase

        public  updatePhase(Phase phase)
                  throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        PUT /phases : Updates an existing phase.
        Parameters:
        phase - the phase to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated phase, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the phase is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the phase couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • getAllPhases

        public java.util.List<Phase> getAllPhases()
        GET /phases : get all the phases.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of phases in body

      • getPhasesByProject

        public java.util.List<Phase> getPhasesByProject(java.lang.Long id)

      • getPhase

        public  getPhase(java.lang.Long id)
        GET /phases/:id : get the "id" phase.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the phase to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the phase, or with status 404 (Not Found)

      • deletePhase

        public  deletePhase(java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE /phases/:id : delete the "id" phase.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the phase to delete
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
